snippet: In an email sent in August 2012 to General Manager Danny Ferry and other members of the Atlanta Hawks’ ownership, Bruce Levenson pointed out the team’s continued struggles to attract fans and corporate sponsors from Atlanta’s white community.
lead_paragraph: In an email sent in August 2012 to General Manager Danny Ferry and other members of the Atlanta Hawks’ ownership, Bruce Levenson pointed out the team’s continued struggles to attract fans and corporate sponsors from Atlanta’s white community.

headline.main: Bruce Levenson’s Email to Hawks Executives
